attributes.action: Reduce the amount of examinations public school children have to do
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The amount of exams public school children have to do is way out of control. A recent statistic showed that the U.K's children are the most tested in Europe. Is the Prime Minister happy with this statistic? I'm not saying he should stop exams altogether but just put a limit on it.
